alert.note: Alert for Benton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 16 at 4:18AM EST until December 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /7 AM EST/ EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts of up to 45 to 55 mph easing through this morning. * WHERE...In Indiana, Benton County. In Illinois, Ogle, Grundy, Lee, La Salle, Ford, Livingston and Iroquois Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST /7 AM EST/ early this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will be capable of blowing down branches as well as power lines. Scattered power outages will continue. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
